name: ¡A Huevo!
preparation:
This mashup of a Michelada and Margarita is a big ¡a huevo! (or “hell, yeah”). Tequila gets a sweetening assist from Bud Light Lime-A-Rita, fresh lime juice pushes the acid forward, and hot sauce (I’m a Valentina guy, but follow your heart) leaves a gentle burn on the end.

Salt the rim of a rocks glass.

Add the tequila and lime juice and hot sauce to a shaker with plenty of ice, and shake vigorously for 30 seconds.

Strain into the prepared glass, and top with Bud Light Lime-A-Rita.
